name: dungeons-and-components
description: A React component library for Dungeons and Dragons.
author: Christopher Baker <christpher@dmyetti.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfiles && tsc
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copyfiles && tsc  --watch
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:pre: npm version prerelease && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --tag=pre
